job_tasks.phrase: Implementing a search/text summarisation product using the provided LLM services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to implementing functionalities (search, summarization) that leverage LLM services, which is a core aspect of generative modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing proper architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale
job_tasks.justification: This describes the design and implementation of architectural solutions with a focus on non-functional requirements like cost, latency, throughput, and scale, which are fundamental to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Leading a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics, and acting accordingly when violated
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the end-to-end leadership of a service, including monitoring health, performance, and metrics, which are key responsibilities in operations engineering for AI services.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the practice of writing high-quality, maintainable, and production-ready code, which is a core software development principle.

job_tasks.phrase: understand business requirements and translate them into LLM solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates the need to comprehend business needs and convert them into technical solutions, which is the essence of business understanding.
This explicitly states the development of solutions specifically using LLMs, aligning with the modeling task category.

soft_skills.phrase: understand business requirements and translate them into LLM solutions.
Implementing proper architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale
Leading a service end to end

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and implementing products using LLM services, including search and summarization. It also highlights core GenAI Engineer responsibilities like translating business requirements into LLM solutions and leading services end-to-end, which aligns strongly with the profile's definition.
